history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: Zp_mult_comm. qsimpl time: 1 use: Zp_mult_assoc,Zp_mult_comm. qsimpl time: 1 use: Zp_mult_assoc,Zp_mult_comm. qsimpl time: 1 use: Zp_mult_plus_distr_l,Zp_mult_assoc,Zp_mult_comm. qsimpl time: 1 use: Zp_mult_plus_distr_l,Zp_mult_assoc,Zp_mult_comm. qsimpl time: 1 use: Zp_mult_plus_distr_l,Zp_mult_assoc,Zp_mult_comm. qsimpl time: 1 use: Zp_mult_plus_distr_l,Zp_mult_assoc,Zp_mult_plus_distr_r,Zp_mult_comm.

In environment p : nat Hp : p = 0 -> False H3 : forall x y, x ⊗ y = y ⊗ x H1 : forall x y z : Z_Zp, x ⊗ (y ⊗ z) = x ⊗ y ⊗ z H0 : forall x y z : Z_Zp, x ⊗ (y ⊕ z) = x ⊗ y ⊕ x ⊗ z x, y, ix : Z_Zp Hix : ix ⊗ x = Op iy : Z_Zp Hiy : iy ⊗ y = Op Unable to unify "(?M3926 ⊕ ?M3927) ⊗ ?M3925 = ?M3926 ⊗ ?M3925 ⊕ ?M3927 ⊗ ?M3925" with "ix ⊗ (iy ⊗ (x ⊗ y)) = Op".

original: intros Hx Hy. unfold Zp_invertible in *. destruct Hx as [ix Hix]. destruct Hy as [iy Hiy]. exists (ix ⊗ iy). rewrite <- Zp_mult_assoc. rewrite <- Zp_mult_comm with (x := ix). rewrite <- Zp_mult_assoc. rewrite Hix. rewrite Zp_mult_plus_distr_l. rewrite <- Zp_mult_comm with (x := iy). rewrite Hiy. apply Zp_mult_plus_distr_r.
